= Parking Brake =

The parking brake is a clamp that locks the wheels. Its important eg after push back as a slight incline would means around 400 tons + passengers slowly going backwards for example.


This image below is pilot who forgot to take off the parking brake.

[http://www.airlineempires.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2007/09/parking-brake2.jpg]

It normally appears as a big red light with a lever.
So its Either ON or off
